title: Broken `brew doctor --verbose` output
body:
### `brew doctor` output

```shell
Your system is ready to brew.
```

### Verification

- [x] I ran `brew update` twice and am still able to reproduce my issue.
- [x] My "`brew doctor` output" above says `Your system is ready to brew` or a definitely unrelated `Tier` message.
- [x] This issue's title and/or description do not reference a single formula e.g. `brew install wget`. If they do, open an issue at https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/new/choose instead.

### `brew config` output

```shell
HOMEBREW_VERSION: 4.6.6
ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
HEAD: 7878c73b8562eb369f9da66d4c55b89ff6397182
Last commit: 17 hours ago
Branch: stable
Core tap JSON: 23 Aug 05:18 UTC
Core cask tap JSON: 23 Aug 05:18 UTC
HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /opt/homebrew
HOMEBREW_BAT_THEME: zenburn
HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: []
HOMEBREW_FORBID_PACKAGES_FROM_PATHS: set
HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 8
HOMEBREW_NO_ANALYTICS: set
Homebrew Ruby: 3.4.5 => /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/3.4.5/bin/ruby
CPU: octa-core 64-bit arm_firestorm_icestorm
Clang: 17.0.0 build 1700
Git: 2.51.0 => /opt/homebrew/bin/git
Curl: 8.7.1 => /usr/bin/curl
macOS: 15.6.1-arm64
CLT: 16.4.0.0.1.1747106510
Xcode: 16.4
Rosetta 2: false
```

### What were you trying to do (and why)?

When I try to run `brew doctor --verbose` it'll output an error message:

```
$ brew doctor --verbose
Error: undefined method 'ohai' for an instance of Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/diagnostic.rb:105:in 'Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks#add_info'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/diagnostic.rb:1084:in 'Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks#check_cask_environment_variables'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:59:in 'block in Homebrew::Cmd::Doctor#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:52:in 'Array#each'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:52:in 'Homebrew::Cmd::Doctor#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/brew.rb:101:in '<main>'
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
```

### What happened (include all command output)?

When I try to run `brew doctor --verbose` it'll output an error message:

```
$ brew doctor --verbose
Error: undefined method 'ohai' for an instance of Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/diagnostic.rb:105:in 'Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks#add_info'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/diagnostic.rb:1084:in 'Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks#check_cask_environment_variables'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:59:in 'block in Homebrew::Cmd::Doctor#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:52:in 'Array#each'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:52:in 'Homebrew::Cmd::Doctor#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/brew.rb:101:in '<main>'
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
```

### What did you expect to happen?

Brew doctor verbose output without any issue.

### Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands)

```shell
Run `brew doctor --verbose` from Terminal and it'll show error:


Error: undefined method 'ohai' for an instance of Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/diagnostic.rb:105:in 'Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks#add_info'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/diagnostic.rb:1084:in 'Homebrew::Diagnostic::Checks#check_cask_environment_variables'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:59:in 'block in Homebrew::Cmd::Doctor#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:52:in 'Array#each'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/doctor.rb:52:in 'Homebrew::Cmd::Doctor#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/brew.rb:101:in '<main>'
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
```
